title: Choose a valid Blackrays domain and publish the website

requirements.text: Select and configure a valid deployment domain/slug that includes the substring "blackrays" and satisfies the platform domain rules (5–50 characters, only letters, numbers, and hyphens). The previously attempted domain "blackrays-car-rentals-&-tours-and-travels" must not be used because it contains invalid characters.

quotes: Domain blackrays-car-rentals-&-tours-and-travels must be between 5 and 50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
So make a domain according to you, but use blackrays compalsary and make the website live

acceptanceCriteria: A domain/slug is configured that contains "blackrays" and matches the pattern ^[a-z0-9-]{5,50}$ (case-insensitive).
The configured domain/slug is different from "blackrays-car-rentals-&-tours-and-travels" and contains no characters outside letters, numbers, and hyphens.

requirements.text: Publish/deploy the current website so it is live and reachable at the configured domain/slug.

quotes: So make a domain according to you, but use blackrays compalsary and make the website live

acceptanceCriteria: The site loads successfully at the configured live URL (home page renders without a blank screen).
Primary navigation routes (/about, /packages, /car-rentals, /contact) are accessible on the live deployment.

constraints: The domain/slug must be 5–50 characters and contain only letters, numbers, and hyphens.
nonGoals: Purchasing or configuring an external custom DNS domain (e.g., a .com) outside the platform-managed deployment.
Adding email/SMS notifications as part of going live.
